subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: McHugh, who was winless during his time with the Mets, pitched six innings and held Kansas City to two Kendrys Morales solo homers as Houston continued its wild-card momentum.
snippet: McHugh, who was winless during his time with the Mets, pitched six innings and held Kansas City to two Kendrys Morales solo homers as Houston continued its wild-card momentum.
